程序包 org.giiwa.web

接口 IFilter

public interface IFilter
the Module Filter for the url
the filter is configured in module.xml 
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<module version="1.0">
  ...
 <filter>
   <pattern>/user/login</pattern>
   <class>org.giiwa.forum.web.UserFilter</class>
 </filter>
 ...
</module>
作者:
wujun

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    default boolean
    after(Controller m)
    after dispatched to the model
    default boolean
    before(Controller m)
    before dispatch to the model

  • 方法详细资料

    • before

      default boolean before(Controller m)
      before dispatch to the model
      参数:
      m - the model
      返回:
      boolean, true = pass to the model, pass to the next "filter"; false = stop pass to the model, and stop pass to the next "filter"

    • after

      default boolean after(Controller m)
      after dispatched to the model
      参数:
      m - the model
      返回:
      boolean, true = pass to the next "filter", false = stop the pass to the next "filter"
